description:
Victim Banana lies on the floor in the kitchen of a train bound for parts unknown. Bananya and friends are gathered together by Police Bananya, who`s investigating the incident. Someone among them must be the culprit... but the investigation comes to a standstill. Just then, they`re joined by a great detective who can solve any case!
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: めいたんてい ばな, にゃ!
